title: Southern Charm Reunion Part 1 Recap + Bethenny Leaves #RHONY
itunes:title: Southern Charm Reunion Part 1 Recap + Bethenny Leaves #RHONY
itunes:subtitle: Danny starts the show with some devastating #RHONY news, then recaps part 1 of the season 6 Southern Charm reunion. He discusses Cameran's MTV days, reunion herstory, Craigy's suit, and more!*To support this pod & access bonus episodes...
description:
Danny starts the show with some devastating #RHONY news, then recaps part 1 of the season 6 Southern Charm reunion. He discusses Cameran's MTV days, reunion herstory, Craigy's suit, and more!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
